    Direct Known Subclasses:

extends JProcess
implements java.io.Serializable

      • isBlocking

        public abstract boolean isBlocking()
        Determines whether or not the terminal should wait for command completion before accepting new input
        Returns:
        True if this command requires the terminal to stop accepting input. For example, if the Command requires input independently of the argument interface allotted, the Command should block to prevent the Terminal from gaining input and take over the Terminals "in" stream

      • getAliases

        public abstract java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> getAliases()
        Provides an ArrayList of Strings representing different aliases of which this command can be called from
        Returns:
        Command aliases, other strings that will call this command

      • getPerms

        public abstract java.util.ArrayList<Permissions> getPerms()
        Provides an ArrayList of Permission objects which determine this commands security level
        Returns:
        List of required permissions
